ComicInfo.Summary:
Born from the mysterious 90’s comic series Vampblade, comic fan, cosplayer, and shop manager Katie Carva must now continue her quest to fight the invisible other-dimensional vampires from the comics, while the blades push her to all new extremes! It’s all new next-level Vampblade adventures, shiny and chrome!
The hit series starts anew with covers from series artist Winston Young, Zombie Tramp creator Dan Mendoza, and good girl artist Andrew Pepoy (also featuring a blank sketch cover variant).
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Winston Young | 1 | B | Risque Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 4 | E | Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Andrew Pepoy | 5 | F | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Andrew Pepoy | 6 | G | Blank Sketch Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | None | 7 | H | C2E2 Exclusive Variant Cover | ? Metcalf | Missing |
